entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 11.4°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 early this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low plus 1.
